Package screens

package screens
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ScreenSwitcher
    interface that allows screens to switch between each other and properly displayed to user manages all the screen switching aspects of game
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    EndScreen
     
    InstructionsScreen
    screen that is displayed to user whenever they want to view the instructions this is used during the intro screen and in-game
    IntroScreen
     
    PaintingScreen
    paintingScreen that is the screen with the drawing canvas that the user can draw on
    Screen
     
    TypingScreen
    the typing screen in which the user can play the typing game to earn paint
    Window
    the window that PaintButtons have that displays relevant info and buttons
